song_lyric:
我很穷，而你富有
他很寂寞，一事无成
In Peking Street In USA

感到快乐还是难受
Anytime I feel the radio
Oh,it’s my radio
in my head
日夜播放让我自由
If I listen to the radio
Oh, just my radio
that all my life
I’ll play my sounds to you
